summary: Amnesty International is a prominent non-governmental organisation (NGO) dedicated to the advocacy of human rights globally. In the context of EU legal and regulatory frameworks, it plays a crucial role in monitoring compliance with international human rights standards and influencing policy-making. The organisation engages with EU institutions to promote legislative measures that uphold fundamental freedoms and protect individuals from abuses. Through its reports and campaigns, Amnesty International seeks to hold governments accountable and raise awareness of violations, thereby contributing to the EU's commitment to human rights promotion and protection within its member states and beyond.
